results.title: The Potential Therapeutic Application of Simvastatin for Brain Complications and Mechanisms of Action
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ has also been studied as a potential treatment for different types of @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001932 @@@brain tumors@@@ and other @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@brain complications@@@.

results.title: Chitosan-Coated Nanoparticles: Effect of Chitosan Molecular Weight on Nasal Transmucosal Delivery
results.text_hl: This study highlighted the suitability of LNCchit as a promising strategy for the administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for a nose-to-brain approach for the therapy of @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001932 @@@brain tumors@@@.
